about: My name is Andri Bergsson and I'm a software developer living in Copenhagen. I'm currently working as a Backend Engineer at Enalyzer and studying for my MSc degree in Mathematical Modelling and Computation at the Technical University of Denmark.
help:
• path - display current directory
  • cat FILENAME - display FILENAME in window
  • cd DIRECTORY - move into DIRECTORY or just cd to return to root
  • ls - show files in current directory
  • history - see your command history
  • clear - clear current window
